about_the_game:
Grants access to eight powerful bonus demons:

- Tzitzimitl
- Anahita
- Armaiti
- Zaou-Gongen
- Nemissa
- Mara
- Masakado
- Satan

You can fuse bonus demons at the Goumaden. They can also be summoned from the Demon Compendium, with no in-game charge for the first summoning.
